name: 24th Hour
description:
Made for Discord LibGDX GameJam 6 : theme was "Time"

Controls :

  • WSAD (qwerty) or ZSQD (azerty) or Arrows keys
  • Enter or Space to start or resign

Reach the 24th hour to win.

You loose if you get crushed or if you reach 00:00 time.

Music (drone) in browser version has been simplified for technical reason.

Please try Desktop version for full game experience.

Sources available on GitHub

Gamejam entry page here : Libgdx Discord Game Jam Website
